URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3438#issuecomment-456059876
 
 
   @xhochy I ment running `import pyarrow.gandiva` in the manylinux crossbow tasks, to ensure gandiva is available during the packaging, see https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/dev/tasks/python-wheels/linux-test.sh#L30

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.

fields.description: Depends on adding LLVM6 to the build toolchain
fields.summary: [Python] Add Gandiva bindings to Python wheels

comments.body: Working on this but clang requires the system include paths from gcc to be manually passed. I need to write a better detection logic for that.
